title: Battle for Middle Earth 2 & The Witch King Special Edition
description:
The Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth 2, the real-time strategy game based on Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings universe.

This download includes Battle for Middle Earth 2, its expansion The Rise of the Witch King, CD images, a keygen, and WinCDEmu, which is *required* in order to play. Other mounting tools like Daemon Tools and Virtual CloneDrive fail to work.

This is a complete package of the "Special Edition" version available from:
and


which packages up all the different files needed, and includes simplified install instructions.

How to Use:

1. Install WinCDEmu
2. Mount BFME2 Special Edition 106.iso
3. Install, using Multi CD-Key Generator to get a key
4. Extract files from BFME2 CD images.rar into <install directory>\Mini_images
   (Default C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\The Battle for Middle-earth II\Mini_images)
4a. Test by mounting the .mds file using WinCDEmu and open BFME2.
5. Mount RoTWK Special Edition.iso
6. Install, using Multi CD-Key Generator to get a key
7. Extract files from RotWk_Maxi_TheSmokingMan.rar into <install directory>\Mini_images
   (Default C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\The Lord of the Rings, The Rise of the Witch-king\Mini_images)
8. Mount RotWk_Maxi-TheSmokingMan.mds in order to run the game
